mapper.update: update tb_page set page_name = #{pageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_label = #{pageLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, page_cover = #{pageCover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, page_name, page_label, page_cover, create_time, update_time from tb_page
